item.title: Intro to Modern Calligraphy with PoppyJack Shop
item.description:
Join Courtney of POPPYjack Shop for a morning or afternoon full of learning the art of calligraphy! TWO CLASSES AVAILABLE: 10:00 AM - 12:30 PM & 3:00 PM - 5:30 PM.

This class is 2.5 hours and will cover the basics of calligraphy including Courtney’s personal style of alphabet. A supply kit will be provided to use during the class as well as to take home and continue practicing!

Light refreshments will be served.
